Name: Cargo_FoodRation_A
Description: Processed protein blocks and vitamin supplements. Third Class weekly allocation.

Name: Cargo_FoodRation_B
Description: Hydroponically grown vegetables from the greenhouse cars. Destined for Second Class dining.

Name: Cargo_FoodRation_C
Description: Cuts from the cattle cars. First Class exclusive â€” intercepting this is highly illegal.

Name: Cargo_Med_A
Description: Bandages, antiseptic, painkillers. Third Class clinic resupply.

Name: Cargo_Med_B
Description: Sterile instruments, anesthetics, suture kits. High-priority medical cargo.

Name: Cargo_Med_C
Description: Unlabeled vials from the First Class clinic. Contents classified. Handle with care.

Name: Cargo_Luxury_A
Description: Vintage reserves from the wine cellar. First Class social events.

Name: Cargo_Luxury_B
Description: Artisan fragrances from the perfumery. Exclusively for Hospitality zone.

Name: Cargo_Luxury_C
Description: Paintings and sculptures rotating between gallery and ballroom. Fragile.

Name: Cargo_Kronole_A
Description: Raw Kronole precursors. The chemical smell is unmistakable. Kronole Network shipment.

Name: Cargo_Kronole_B
Description: Labeled as medical waste but contents don't match. Refined Kronole hidden inside.

Name: Cargo_Kronole_C
Description: Supposed unclaimed belongings from the Drawers. Actually weapons for the resistance.

Name: Cargo_Kronole_D
Description: Ostensibly a gift for First Class patrons. Hidden compartment contains forged passes.

Name: Cargo_Industrial_A
Description: Machine parts for the Working Spine. Essential for train maintenance.

Name: Cargo_Industrial_B
Description: Wiring, capacitors, circuit boards. Distributed across multiple utility cars.

Name: Cargo_Industrial_C
Description: Sealed containers marked WILFORD INDUSTRIES. Destination: Engine Support only.

Name: Cargo_Water_A
Description: Clean drinking water from the treatment plant. Third Class allocation.

Name: Cargo_Water_B
Description: Specially filtered and mineralized. Hospitality zone exclusive.
